parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Causes a smooth change in the radio volume. The change duration is given by time, the target volume by volume. The default radio volume is 1.0.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''fadeRadio''' volume

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] in seconds

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> volume: [[Number]] - radio volume range 0 to 2. Maximum volume is 2. Default is 1.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>5 [[fadeRadio]] 0.1</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fadeSound]], [[fadeMusic]], [[fadeSpeech]], [[fadeEnvironment]], [[environmentVolume]], [[radioVolume]], [[soundVolume]], [[musicVolume]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on September 11, 2008 - 17:17 (EST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:beta|beta]] <dd class="note">Does not affect VON

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
